messages.title: The Lib Dems Are Winning
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May. Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader. MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent. Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.

messages.title: We Have a Clear Choice
messages.content: The Conservatives want to crash us out through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom. Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.

messages.title: This Election is Your Chance to STOP BREXIT
messages.content: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving lives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving lives.

contactInformation.address: Return to: Northampton Liberal Democrats, 120-126 Kingsley Park Terrace, Northampton NN2 7HB
